title: RobCo raises Series C funding to scale industrial automation
description:
RobCo plans to use the new capital to continue developing its physical AI systems and expand enterprise deployments in the U.S. and Europe.

The post RobCo raises Series C funding to scale industrial automation appeared first on The Robot Report.
